Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements Runnable
Class ClientSocket handles client communication with server It receives messages from the server and passes it to higher level classes (CLI or GUI) and sends messages received from the above-mentioned higher level classes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientSocket(String ip, int port, UI ui)
    Method ClientSocket sets a socket variable given ip and port It also sets a ping system to handle disconnections

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    closeConnection()
    Method closeConnection closes input stream,output stream and socket
    void
    run()
    Method run starts the ping system and while is active passes incoming messages to ui class If runtime exception is caught, closes connection and calls ui for disconnection handling
    void
    send(Message msg)
    Method send sends an incoming message instance to the server

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientSocket

      public ClientSocket(String ip, int port, UI ui) throws IOException, SocketException
      Method ClientSocket sets a socket variable given ip and port It also sets a ping system to handle disconnections
      Parameters:
      ip - is socket ip as string
      port - is socket port
      ui - refers to higher level client class that instantiated this ClientSocket instance
      Throws:
      IOException
      SocketException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run starts the ping system and while is active passes incoming messages to ui class If runtime exception is caught, closes connection and calls ui for disconnection handling
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • send

      public void send(Message msg) throws IOException
      Method send sends an incoming message instance to the server
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to send
      Throws:
      IOException

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection()
      Method closeConnection closes input stream,output stream and socket
